snippet: The announcement comes less than a month before a working group is scheduled to reveal plans for restructuring of Puerto Rico’s debt
abstract: Puerto Rico's Aqueduct and Sewer Authority plans to issue $750 million in bonds to finance projects over four years; action comes just over week after island defaulted on bond payments for first time, and less than a month before meeting on restructuring its debt amid fiscal crisis.
lead_paragraph: The announcement comes less than a month before a working group is scheduled to reveal plans for restructuring of Puerto Rico’s debt

headline.main: Puerto Rico to Issue $750 Million in Revenue Bonds for Construction
headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico to Issue $750 Million in Revenue Bonds for Construction
